00036 struct Path { 
00037   
00038   Path() : _closed( false ) { }
00039 
00040   Path( const std::vector<Point> & points, bool closedPath )
00041     : _points( points ), _closed( closedPath ) { }
00042 
00043   Path( bool closedPath ) : _closed( closedPath ) { }    
00044   
00045   inline void clear();
00046 
00047   inline bool closed() const;
00048 
00049   inline bool empty() const;
00050

00059   Point center() const;
00060 
00068   Path & operator<<( const Point & p );
00069 
00076   Path & pop_back();
00077 
00085   Point & operator[]( const unsigned int n ) {
00086     return _points[ n ];
00087   }
00088 
00096   const Point & operator[]( const unsigned int n ) const {
00097     return _points[ n ];
00098   }
00099 
00108   Path & rotate( double angle, const Point & center );
00109 
00118   Path rotated( double angle, const Point & center ) const;
00119 
00127   Path & rotate( double angle );

00136   Path rotated( double angle ) const;

00186

00188 
00194   void scaleAll( double s );

00197       const TransformEPS & transform ) const;

00210      const TransformCairo & transform ) const;

00212

00220 void
00221 Path::clear()
00222 {
00223   _points.clear();
00224 }
00225

00228 {

00230 }
